title: Your Guide to Antique Shopping in Britain
brief_description: Your Guide to Antique Shopping in Britain is a fact-filled hour of useful and discerning information for people interested in all forms of antique collecting. Where better to go than one of the great cultural, antique and fine-arts centres of the world? Rated: G
